accept_language.description: The value of AcceptLanguage header used when calling SakuraCloud API. It can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified

api_request_rate_limit.description: The maximum number of SakuraCloud API calls per second. It can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_RATE_LIMIT` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified. Default:`10`

api_request_timeout.description: The timeout seconds for each SakuraCloud API call. It can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_API_REQUEST_TIMEOUT` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified. Default:`300`

api_root_url.description: The root URL of SakuraCloud API. It can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_API_ROOT_URL` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified. Default:`https://secure.sakura.ad.jp/cloud/zone`

default_zone.description: The name of zone to use as default for global resources. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_DEFAULT_ZONE` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified

fake_mode.description: The flag to enable fake of SakuraCloud API call. It is for debugging or developping the provider. It can also be sourced from the `FAKE_MODE` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified

fake_store_path.description: The file path used by SakuraCloud API fake driver for storing fake data. It is for debugging or developping the provider. It can also be sourced from the `FAKE_STORE_PATH` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified

profile.description: The profile name of your SakuraCloud account. Default:`default`

retry_max.description: The maximum number of API call retries used when SakuraCloud API returns status code `423` or `503`. It can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_RETRY_MAX` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified. Default:`100`

retry_wait_max.description: The maximum wait interval(in seconds) for retrying API call used when SakuraCloud API returns status code `423` or `503`.  It can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_RETRY_WAIT_MAX` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified

retry_wait_min.description: The minimum wait interval(in seconds) for retrying API call used when SakuraCloud API returns status code `423` or `503`. It can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_RETRY_WAIT_MIN` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified

secret.description: The API secret of your SakuraCloud account. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified

token.description: The API token of your SakuraCloud account. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_ACCESS_TOKEN` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified

trace.description: The flag to enable output trace log. It can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_TRACE` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified

zone.description: The name of zone to use as default. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the `SAKURACLOUD_ZONE` environment variables, or via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified

zones.description: A list of available SakuraCloud zone name. It can also be sourced via a shared credentials file if `profile` is specified. Default:[`is1a`, `is1b`, `tk1a`, `tk1v`]

archive_file.description: The file path to upload to the SakuraCloud

description.description: The description of the archive. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

hash.description: The md5 checksum calculated from the base64 encoded file body

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the archive

name.description: The name of the archive. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

size.description: The size of archive in GiB. This must be one of [`20`/`40`/`60`/`80`/`100`/`250`/`500`/`750`/`1024`]

source_archive_id.description: The id of the source archive. This conflicts with [`source_disk_id`]

source_archive_zone.description: The share key of source shared archive

source_disk_id.description: The id of the source disk. This conflicts with [`source_archive_id`]

source_shared_key.description: The share key of source shared archive

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the archive

zone.description: The name of zone that the archive will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

share_key.description: The key to use sharing the Archive

zone.description: The name of zone that the ArchiveShare will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

description.description: The description of the AutoBackup. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

disk_id.description: The disk id to backed up

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the AutoBackup

max_backup_num.description: The number backup files to keep. This must be in the range [`1`-`10`]

name.description: The name of the AutoBackup. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the AutoBackup

weekdays.description: A list of weekdays to backed up. The values in the list must be in [`sun`/`mon`/`tue`/`wed`/`thu`/`fri`/`sat`]

zone.description: The name of zone that the AutoBackup will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

description.description: The description of the Bridge. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

name.description: The name of the Bridge. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

zone.description: The name of zone that the Bridge will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

access_key.description: The access key for using SakuraCloud Object Storage API

content.description: The content to upload to as the bucket object. This conflicts with [`source`]

content_type.description: The content-type of the bucket object

etag.description: The etag of the bucket object

http_cache_url.description: The URL for cached access to the bucket object via HTTP

http_path_url.description: The URL with path-format for accessing the bucket object via HTTP

http_url.description: The URL for accessing the bucket object via HTTP

https_cache_url.description: The URL for cached access to the bucket object via HTTPS

https_path_url.description: The URL with path-format for accessing the bucket object via HTTPS

https_url.description: The URL for accessing the bucket object via HTTPS

key.description: The name of the bucket object

last_modified.description: The time when the bucket object last modified

secret_key.description: The secret key for using SakuraCloud Object Storage API

size.description: The size of the bucket object in bytes

source.description: The file path to upload to as the bucket object. This conflicts with [`content`]

content.description: The content to upload to as the CD-ROM. This conflicts with [`iso_image_file`]

content_file_name.description: The name of content file to upload to as the CD-ROM. This is only used when `content` is specified. This conflicts with [`iso_image_file`]

description.description: The description of the CD-ROM. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

hash.description: The md5 checksum calculated from the base64 encoded file body

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the CD-ROM

iso_image_file.description: The file path to upload to as the CD-ROM. This conflicts with [`content`]

name.description: The name of the CD-ROM. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

size.description: The size of CD-ROM in GiB. This must be one of [`5`/`10`]

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the CD-ROM

zone.description: The name of zone that the CD-ROM will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

access_level.description: The level of access that allow to users. This must be one of [`readwrite`/`readonly`/`none`]

description.description: The description of the Container Registry. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

fqdn.description: The FQDN for accessing the Container Registry. FQDN is built from `subdomain_label` + `.sakuracr.jp`

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the Container Registry

name.description: The name of the Container Registry. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

subdomain_label.description: The label at the lowest of the FQDN used when be accessed from users. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the Container Registry

virtual_domain.description: The alias for accessing the container registry

name.description: The user name used to authenticate remote access

password.description: The password used to authenticate remote access

permission.description: The level of access that allow to the user. This must be one of [`all`/`readwrite`/`readonly`]

database_type.description: The type of the database. This must be one of [`mariadb`/`postgres`]

description.description: The description of the Database. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the Database

name.description: The name of the Database. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

password.description: The password of default user on the database

plan.description: The plan name of the Database. This must be one of [`10g`/`30g`/`90g`/`240g`/`500g`/`1t`]

replica_password.description: The password of user that processing a replication

replica_user.description: The name of user that processing a replication

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the Database

username.description: The name of default user on the database. The length of this value must be in the range [`3`-`20`]

zone.description: The name of zone that the Database will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

time.description: The time to take backup. This must be formatted with `HH:mm`

weekdays.description: A list of weekdays to backed up. The values in the list must be in [`sun`/`mon`/`tue`/`wed`/`thu`/`fri`/`sat`]

gateway.description: The IP address of the gateway used by Database

ip_address.description: The IP address to assign to the Database

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet to assign to the Database. This must be in the range [`8`-`29`]

port.description: The number of the listening port. This must be in the range [`1024`-`65535`]

source_ranges.description: The range of source IP addresses that allow to access to the Database via network

switch_id.description: The id of the switch to which the Database connects

description.description: The description of the read-replica database. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the read-replica database

master_id.description: The id of the replication master database

name.description: The name of the read-replica database. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the read-replica database

zone.description: The name of zone that the read-replica database will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

gateway.description: The IP address of the gateway used by read-replica database. If `gateway` isn't specified, it will be set to the same value of the master database

ip_address.description: The IP address to assign to the read-replica database

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet to assign to the read-replica database. This must be in the range [`8`-`29`]. If `netmask` isn't specified, it will be set to the same value of the master database

source_ranges.description: The range of source IP addresses that allow to access to the read-replica database via network

switch_id.description: The id of the switch to which the read-replica database connects. If `switch_id` isn't specified, it will be set to the same value of the master database

connector.description: The name of the disk connector. This must be one of [`virtio`/`ide`]

description.description: The description of the disk. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

distant_from.description: A list of disk id. The disk will be located to different storage from these disks

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the disk

name.description: The name of the disk. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

plan.description: The plan name of the disk. This must be one of [`ssd`/`hdd`]

server_id.description: The id of the Server connected to the disk

size.description: The size of disk in GiB

source_archive_id.description: The id of the source archive. This conflicts with [`source_disk_id`]

source_disk_id.description: The id of the source disk. This conflicts with [`source_archive_id`]

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the disk

zone.description: The name of zone that the disk will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

description.description: The description of the DNS. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

dns_servers.description: A list of IP address of DNS server that manage this zone

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the DNS

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the DNS

zone.description: The target zone. (e.g. `example.com`)

name.description: The name of the DNS Record. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

port.description: The number of port. This must be in the range [`1`-`65535`]

priority.description: The priority of target DNS Record. This must be in the range [`0`-`65535`]

type.description: The type of DNS Record. This must be one of [`A`/`AAAA`/`ALIAS`/`CNAME`/`NS`/`MX`/`TXT`/`SRV`/`CAA`/`PTR`]

value.description: The value of the DNS Record

weight.description: The weight of target DNS Record. This must be in the range [`0`-`65535`]

dns_id.description: The id of the DNS resource

name.description: The name of the DNS Record resource

port.description: The number of port. This must be in the range [`1`-`65535`]

priority.description: The priority of target DNS Record. This must be in the range [`0`-`65535`]

type.description: The type of DNS Record. This must be one of [`A`/`AAAA`/`ALIAS`/`CNAME`/`NS`/`MX`/`TXT`/`SRV`/`CAA`/`PTR`]

value.description: The value of the DNS Record

weight.description: The weight of target DNS Record. This must be in the range [`0`-`65535`]

description.description: The description of the GSLB. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

fqdn.description: The FQDN for accessing to the GSLB. This is typically used as value of CNAME record

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the GSLB

name.description: The name of the GSLB. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

sorry_server.description: The IP address of the SorryServer. This will be used when all servers are down

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the GSLB

weighted.description: The flag to enable weighted load-balancing

delay_loop.description: The interval in seconds between checks. This must be in the range [`10`-`60`]

host_header.description: The value of host header send when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

path.description: The path used when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

port.description: The port number used when checking by TCP

protocol.description: The protocol used for health checks. This must be one of [`http`/`https`/`tcp`/`ping`]

status.description: The response-code to expect when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

enabled.description: The flag to enable as destination of load balancing

ip_address.description: The IP address of the server

weight.description: The weight used when weighted load balancing is enabled. This must be in the range [`1`-`10000`]

base64content.description: The base64 encoded content to upload to as the Icon. This conflicts with [`source`]

name.description: The name of the Icon. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

source.description: The file path to upload to as the Icon. This conflicts with [`base64content`]

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the Icon

url.description: The URL for getting the icon's raw data

band_width.description: The bandwidth of the network connected to the Internet in Mbps. `100`/`250`/`500`/`1000`/`1500`/`2000`/`2500`/`3000`/`5000`

description.description: The description of the Switch+Router. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

gateway.description: The IP address of the gateway used by the Switch+Router

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the Switch+Router

ip_addresses.description: A list of assigned global address to the Switch+Router

ipv6_network_address.description: The IPv6 network address assigned to the Switch+Router

ipv6_prefix.description: The network prefix of assigned IPv6 addresses to the Switch+Router

ipv6_prefix_len.description: The bit length of IPv6 network prefix

max_ip_address.description: Maximum IP address in assigned global addresses to the Switch+Router

min_ip_address.description: Minimum IP address in assigned global addresses to the Switch+Router

name.description: The name of the Switch+Router. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet assigned to the Switch+Router. `26`/`27`/`28`

network_address.description: The IPv4 network address assigned to the Switch+Router

server_ids.description: A list of the ID of Servers connected to the Switch+Router

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the Switch+Router

zone.description: The name of zone that the Switch+Router will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

hostname.description: The value of the PTR record. This must be FQDN

ip_address.description: The IP address to which the PTR record is set

retry_interval.description: The wait interval(in seconds) for retrying API call used when SakuraCloud API returns any errors

retry_max.description: The maximum number of API call retries used when SakuraCloud API returns any errors

zone.description: The name of zone that the IPv4 PTR will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

description.description: The description of the LoadBalancer. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the LoadBalancer

name.description: The name of the LoadBalancer. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

plan.description: The plan name of the LoadBalancer. This must be one of [`standard`/`highspec`]

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the LoadBalancer

zone.description: The name of zone that the LoadBalancer will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

gateway.description: The IP address of the gateway used by LoadBalancer

ip_addresses.description: A list of IP address to assign to the LoadBalancer.

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet assigned to the LoadBalancer. This must be in the range [`8`-`29`]

switch_id.description: The id of the switch to which the LoadBalancer connects

delay_loop.description: The interval in seconds between checks. This must be in the range [`10`-`2147483647`]

description.description: The description of the VIP. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

port.description: The target port number for load-balancing. This must be in the range [`1`-`65535`]

sorry_server.description: The IP address of the SorryServer. This will be used when all servers under this VIP are down

enabled.description: The flag to enable as destination of load balancing

ip_address.description: The IP address of the destination server

path.description: The path used when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

protocol.description: The protocol used for health checks. This must be one of [`http`/`https`/`tcp`/`ping`]

status.description: The response code to expect when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

description.description: The description of the LocalRouter. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the LocalRouter

name.description: The name of the LocalRouter. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

secret_keys.description: A list of secret key used for peering from other LocalRouters

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the LocalRouter

ip_addresses.description: A list of IP address to assign to the LocalRouter.

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet assigned to the LocalRouter. This must be in the range [`8`-`29`]

description.description: The description of the LocalRouter. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

enabled.description: The flag to enable the LocalRouter

peer_id.description: The ID of the peer LocalRouter

secret_key.description: The secret key of the peer LocalRouter

next_hop.description: The IP address of the next hop

category.description: The category name of connected services (e.g. `cloud`, `vps`)

code.description: The resource ID of the Switch

description.description: The description of the MobileGateway. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

dns_servers.description: A list of IP address used by each connected devices

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the MobileGateway

inter_device_communication.description: The flag to allow communication between each connected devices

internet_connection.description: The flag to enable connect to the Internet

name.description: The name of the MobileGateway. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

public_ip.description: The public IP address assigned to the MobileGateway

public_netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet assigned to the MobileGateway

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the MobileGateway

zone.description: The name of zone that the MobileGateway will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

ip_address.description: The IP address to assign to the MobileGateway

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet to assign to the MobileGateway. This must be in the range [`8`-`29`]

switch_id.description: The id of the switch to which the MobileGateway connects

ip_address.description: The IP address to assign to the SIM

sim_id.description: The id of the Switch connected to the MobileGateway

prefix.description: The destination network prefix used by the sim routing. This must be specified by CIDR block formatted string

sim_id.description: The id of the routing destination SIM

next_hop.description: The IP address of next hop

prefix.description: The destination network prefix used by static routing. This must be specified by CIDR block formatted string

auto_traffic_shaping.description: The flag to enable the traffic shaping

band_width_limit.description: The bandwidth allowed when the traffic shaping is enabled

enable_email.description: The flag to enable email notification when the traffic shaping is enabled

enable_slack.description: The flag to enable slack notification when the traffic shaping is enabled

quota.description: The threshold of monthly traffic usage to enable to the traffic shaping

slack_webhook.description: The webhook URL used when sends notification. It will only used when `enable_slack` is set `true`

description.description: The description of the NFS. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the NFS

name.description: The name of the NFS. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

plan.description: The plan name of the NFS. This must be one of [`hdd`/`ssd`]

size.description: The size of NFS in GiB

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the NFS

zone.description: The name of zone that the NFS will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

gateway.description: The IP address of the gateway used by NFS

ip_address.description: The IP address to assign to the NFS

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet to assign to the NFS. This must be in the range [`8`-`29`]

switch_id.description: The id of the switch to which the NFS connects

class.description: The class of the Note. This must be one of `shell`/`yaml_cloud_config`

content.description: The content of the Note. This must be specified as a shell script or as a cloud-config

description.description: The description of the Note. This will be computed from special tags within body of `content`

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the Note

name.description: The name of the Note. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the Note

description.description: The description of the packetFilter. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

name.description: The name of the packetFilter. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

zone.description: The name of zone that the packetFilter will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

allow.description: The flag to allow the packet through the filter

description.description: The description of the expression

destination_port.description: A destination port number or port range used for filtering (e.g. `1024`, `1024-2048`)

protocol.description: The protocol used for filtering. This must be one of [`http`/`https`/`tcp`/`udp`/`icmp`/`fragment`/`ip`]

source_network.description: A source IP address or CIDR block used for filtering (e.g. `192.0.2.1`, `192.0.2.0/24`)

source_port.description: A source port number or port range used for filtering (e.g. `1024`, `1024-2048`)

packet_filter_id.description: The id of the packet filter that set expressions to

zone.description: The name of zone that the PacketFilter Rule will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

allow.description: The flag to allow the packet through the filter

description.description: The description of the expression

destination_port.description: A destination port number or port range used for filtering (e.g. `1024`, `1024-2048`)

protocol.description: The protocol used for filtering. This must be one of [`http`/`https`/`tcp`/`udp`/`icmp`/`fragment`/`ip`]

source_network.description: A source IP address or CIDR block used for filtering (e.g. `192.0.2.1`, `192.0.2.0/24`)

source_port.description: A source port number or port range used for filtering (e.g. `1024`, `1024-2048`)

assigned_core.description: The total number of CPUs assigned to servers on the private host

assigned_memory.description: The total size of memory assigned to servers on the private host

class.description: The class of the PrivateHost. This will be one of [`dynamic`/`ms_windows`]

description.description: The description of the PrivateHost. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

hostname.description: The hostname of the private host

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the PrivateHost

name.description: The name of the PrivateHost. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the PrivateHost

zone.description: The name of zone that the PrivateHost will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

description.description: The description of the ProxyLB. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

fqdn.description: The FQDN for accessing to the ProxyLB. This is typically used as value of CNAME record

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the ProxyLB

name.description: The name of the ProxyLB. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

plan.description: The plan name of the ProxyLB. This must be one of [`100`/`500`/`1000`/`5000`/`10000`/`50000`/`100000`]

proxy_networks.description: A list of CIDR block used by the ProxyLB to access the server

region.description: The name of region that the proxy LB is in. This must be one of [`tk1`/`is1`/`anycast`]

sticky_session.description: The flag to enable sticky session

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the ProxyLB

vip.description: The virtual IP address assigned to the ProxyLB

vip_failover.description: The flag to enable VIP fail-over

proxy_mode.description: The proxy mode. This must be one of [`http`/`https`/`tcp`]

redirect_to_https.description: The flag to enable redirection from http to https. This flag is used only when `proxy_mode` is `http`

support_http2.description: The flag to enable HTTP/2. This flag is used only when `proxy_mode` is `https`

header.description: The field name of HTTP header added to response by the ProxyLB

value.description: The field value of HTTP header added to response by the ProxyLB

intermediate_cert.description: The intermediate certificate for a server

private_key.description: The private key for a server

intermediate_cert.description: The intermediate certificate for a server

private_key.description: The private key for a server

delay_loop.description: The interval in seconds between checks. This must be in the range [`10`-`60`]

host_header.description: The value of host header send when checking by HTTP

path.description: The path used when checking by HTTP

port.description: The port number used when checking by TCP

protocol.description: The protocol used for health checks. This must be one of [`http`/`tcp`]

group.description: The name of load balancing group. When proxyLB received request which matched to `host` and `path`, proxyLB forwards the request to servers that having same group name. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`10`]

host.description: The value of HTTP host header that is used as condition of rule-based balancing

path.description: The request path that is used as condition of rule-based balancing

enabled.description: The flag to enable as destination of load balancing

group.description: The name of load balancing group. This is used when using rule-based load balancing. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`10`]

ip_address.description: The IP address of the destination server

port.description: The port number of the destination server. This must be in the range [`1`-`65535`]

ip_address.description: The IP address of the SorryServer. This will be used when all servers are down

port.description: The port number of the SorryServer. This will be used when all servers are down

accept_tos.description: The flag to accept the current Let's Encrypt terms of service(see: https://letsencrypt.org/repository/). This must be set `true` explicitly

common_name.description: The FQDN used by ACME. This must set resolvable value

proxylb_id.description: The id of the ProxyLB that set ACME settings to

update_delay_sec.description: The wait time in seconds. This typically used for waiting for a DNS propagation

cdrom_id.description: The id of the CD-ROM to attach to the Server

commitment.description: The policy of how to allocate virtual CPUs to the server. This must be one of [`standard`/`dedicatedcpu`]

description.description: The description of the Server. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

disks.description: A list of disk id connected to the server

dns_servers.description: A list of IP address of DNS server in the zone

force_shutdown.description: The flag to use force shutdown when need to reboot/shutdown while applying

gateway.description: The IP address of the gateway used by Server

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the Server

interface_driver.description: The driver name of network interface. This must be one of [`virtio`/`e1000`]

ip_address.description: The IP address assigned to the Server

memory.description: The size of memory in GiB

name.description: The name of the Server. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet assigned to the Server

network_address.description: The network address which the `ip_address` belongs

private_host_id.description: The id of the PrivateHost which the Server is assigned

private_host_name.description: The id of the PrivateHost which the Server is assigned

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the Server

zone.description: The name of zone that the Server will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

change_partition_uuid.description: The flag to change partition uuid

disable_pw_auth.description: The flag to disable password authentication

enable_dhcp.description: The flag to enable DHCP client

gateway.description: The gateway address used by the Server

hostname.description: The hostname of the Server. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

ip_address.description: The IP address to assign to the Server

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet to assign to the Server

note_ids.description: A list of the Note id

password.description: The password of default user. The length of this value must be in the range [`8`-`64`]

ssh_key_ids.description: A list of the SSHKey id

api_key_id.description: The id of the API key to be injected into note when editing the disk

id.description: The id of the note

variables.description: The value of the variable that be injected into note when editing the disk

packet_filter_id.description: The id of the packet filter to attach to the network interface

upstream.description: The upstream type or upstream switch id. This must be one of [`shared`/`disconnect`/`<switch id>`]

user_ip_address.description: The IP address for only display. This value doesn't affect actual NIC settings

carrier.description: A list of a communication company. Each element must be one of `kddi`/`docomo`/`softbank`

description.description: The description of the SIM. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

enabled.description: The flag to enable the SIM

iccid.description: ICCID(Integrated Circuit Card ID) assigned to the SIM

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the SIM

imei.description: The id of the device to restrict devices that can use the SIM

ip_address.description: The IP address assigned to the SIM

mobile_gateway_id.description: The id of the MobileGateway which the SIM is assigned

name.description: The name of the SIM. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

passcode.description: The passcord to authenticate the SIM

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the SIM

delay_loop.description: The interval in seconds between checks. This must be in the range [`60`-`3600`]

description.description: The description of the SimpleMonitor. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

enabled.description: The flag to enable monitoring by the simple monitor

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the SimpleMonitor

notify_email_enabled.description: The flag to enable notification by email

notify_email_html.description: The flag to enable HTML format instead of text format

notify_interval.description: The interval in hours between notification. This must be in the range [`1`-`72`]

notify_slack_enabled.description: The flag to enable notification by slack/discord

notify_slack_webhook.description: The webhook URL for sending notification by slack/discord

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the SimpleMonitor

target.description: The monitoring target of the simple monitor. This must be IP address or FQDN

community.description: The SNMP community string used when checking by SNMP

excepcted_data.description: The expected value used when checking by DNS

host_header.description: The value of host header send when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

oid.description: The SNMP OID used when checking by SNMP

password.description: The password for basic auth used when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

path.description: The path used when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

protocol.description: The protocol used for health checks. This must be one of [`http`/`https`/`ping`/`tcp`/`dns`/`ssh`/`smtp`/`pop3`/`snmp`/`sslcertificate`]

qname.description: The FQDN used when checking by DNS

remaining_days.description: The number of remaining days until certificate expiration used when checking SSL certificates. This must be in the range [`1`-`9999`]

sni.description: The flag to enable SNI when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

snmp_version.description: The SNMP version used when checking by SNMP. This must be one of `1`/`2c`

status.description: The response-code to expect when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

username.description: The user name for basic auth used when checking by HTTP/HTTPS

description.description: The description of the SSHKey. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

fingerprint.description: The fingerprint of the public key

name.description: The name of the SSHKey. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

public_key.description: The body of the public key

description.description: The description of the SSHKey. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

fingerprint.description: The fingerprint of the public key

name.description: The name of the SSHKey. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

pass_phrase.description: The pass phrase of the private key. The length of this value must be in the range [`8`-`64`]

private_key.description: The body of the private key

public_key.description: The body of the public key

internet_id.description: The id of the switch+router resource that the subnet belongs

ip_addresses.description: A list of assigned global address to the subnet

max_ip_address.description: Maximum IP address in assigned global addresses to the subnet

min_ip_address.description: Minimum IP address in assigned global addresses to the subnet

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet to assign to the Subnet. This must be in the range [`26`-`28`]

network_address.description: The IPv4 network address assigned to the Subnet

next_hop.description: The ip address of the next-hop at the subnet

switch_id.description: The id of the switch connected from the Subnet

zone.description: The name of zone that the Subnet will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

bridge_id.description: The bridge id attached to the Switch

description.description: The description of the Switch. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the Switch

name.description: The name of the Switch. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

server_ids.description: A list of server id connected to the switch

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the Switch

zone.description: The name of zone that the Switch will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

description.description: The description of the VPCRouter. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`512`]

icon_id.description: The icon id to attach to the VPCRouter

internet_connection.description: The flag to enable connecting to the Internet from the VPC Router

name.description: The name of the VPCRouter. The length of this value must be in the range [`1`-`64`]

plan.description: The plan name of the VPCRouter. This must be one of [`standard`/`premium`/`highspec`/`highspec4000`]

public_ip.description: The public ip address of the VPC Router

public_netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet to assign to the public network interface

syslog_host.description: The ip address of the syslog host to which the VPC Router sends logs

tags.description: Any tags to assign to the VPCRouter

zone.description: The name of zone that the VPCRouter will be created (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

dns_servers.description: A list of IP address of DNS server to assign to DHCP client

interface_index.description: The index of the network interface on which to enable the DHCP service. This must be in the range [`1`-`7`]

range_start.description: The start value of IP address range to assign to DHCP client

range_stop.description: The end value of IP address range to assign to DHCP client

ip_address.description: The static IP address to assign to DHCP client

mac_address.description: The source MAC address of static mapping

direction.description: The direction to apply the firewall. This must be one of [`send`/`receive`]

interface_index.description: The index of the network interface on which to enable filtering. This must be in the range [`0`-`7`]

allow.description: The flag to allow the packet through the filter

description.description: The description of the expression. The length of this value must be in the range [`0`-`512`]

destination_network.description: A destination IP address or CIDR block used for filtering (e.g. `192.0.2.1`, `192.0.2.0/24`)

destination_port.description: A destination port number or port range used for filtering (e.g. `1024`, `1024-2048`). This is only used when `protocol` is `tcp` or `udp`

logging.description: The flag to enable packet logging when matching the expression

protocol.description: The protocol used for filtering. This must be one of [`tcp`/`udp`/`icmp`/`ip`]

source_network.description: A source IP address or CIDR block used for filtering (e.g. `192.0.2.1`, `192.0.2.0/24`)

source_port.description: A source port number or port range used for filtering (e.g. `1024`, `1024-2048`). This is only used when `protocol` is `tcp` or `udp`

pre_shared_secret.description: The pre shared secret for L2TP/IPsec

range_start.description: The start value of IP address range to assign to L2TP/IPsec client

range_stop.description: The end value of IP address range to assign to L2TP/IPsec client

description.description: The description of the port forwarding. The length of this value must be in the range [`0`-`512`]

private_ip.description: The destination ip address of the port forwarding

private_port.description: The destination port number of the port forwarding. This will be a port number on a private network

protocol.description: The protocol used for port forwarding. This must be one of [`tcp`/`udp`]

public_port.description: The source port number of the port forwarding. This must be a port number on a public network

range_start.description: The start value of IP address range to assign to PPTP client

range_stop.description: The end value of IP address range to assign to PPTP client

index.description: The index of the network interface. This must be in the range [`1`-`7`]

ip_addresses.description: A list of ip address to assign to the network interface. This is required only one value when `plan` is `standard`, two values otherwise

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet to assign to the network interface

switch_id.description: The id of the connected switch

vip.description: The virtual IP address to assign to the network interface. This is only required when `plan` is not `standard`

aliases.description: A list of ip alias to assign to the VPC Router. This can only be specified if `plan` is not `standard`

ip_addresses.description: The list of the IP address to assign to the VPC Router. This is required only one value when `plan` is `standard`, two values otherwise

switch_id.description: The id of the switch to connect. This is only required when when `plan` is not `standard`

vip.description: The virtual IP address of the VPC Router. This is only required when `plan` is not `standard`

vrid.description: The Virtual Router Identifier. This is only required when `plan` is not `standard`

local_prefix.description: A list of CIDR block of the network under the VPC Router

peer.description: The IP address of the opposing appliance connected to the VPC Router

pre_shared_secret.description: The pre shared secret for the VPN. The length of this value must be in the range [`0`-`40`]

remote_id.description: The id of the opposing appliance connected to the VPC Router. This is typically set same as value of `peer`

routes.description: A list of CIDR block of VPN connected networks

description.description: The description of the static nat. The length of this value must be in the range [`0`-`512`]

private_ip.description: The private IP address used for the static NAT

public_ip.description: The public IP address used for the static NAT

next_hop.description: The IP address of the next hop

name.description: The user name used to authenticate remote access

password.description: The password used to authenticate remote access

description.description: The description of the Archive

icon_id.description: The icon id attached to the Archive

name.description: The name of the Archive

os_type.description:
The criteria used to filter SakuraCloud archives. This must be one of following:  
`centos`/`centos8`/`centos7`/`centos6`/`ubuntu`/`ubuntu1804`/`ubuntu1604`/`debian`/`debian10`/`debian9`/`coreos`/`rancheros`/`k3os`/`kusanagi`/`freebsd`/`windows2016`/`windows2016-rds`/`windows2016-rds-office`/`windows2016-sql-web`/`windows2016-sql-standard`/`windows2016-sql-standard-all`/`windows2016-sql2017-standard`/`windows2016-sql2017-enterprise`/`windows2016-sql2017-standard-all`/`windows2019`/`windows2019-rds`/`windows2019-rds-office2016`/`windows2019-rds-office2019`/`windows2019-sql2017-web`/`windows2019-sql2019-web`/`windows2019-sql2017-standard`/`windows2019-sql2019-standard`/`windows2019-sql2017-enterprise`/`windows2019-sql2019-enterprise`/`windows2019-sql2017-standard-all`/`windows2019-sql2019-standard-all`

size.description: The size of Archive in GiB

tags.description: Any tags assigned to the Archive

zone.description: The name of zone that the Archive is in (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

name.description: The name of the PrivateHost

tags.description: Any tags assigned to the PrivateHost

zone.description: The name of zone that the PrivateHost is in (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

id.description: The resource id on SakuraCloud used for filtering

names.description: The resource names on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

tags.description: The resource tags on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

name.description: The name of the target field. This value is case-sensitive

values.description: The values of the condition. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

description.description: The description of the ProxyLB

fqdn.description: The FQDN for accessing to the ProxyLB. This is typically used as value of CNAME record

icon_id.description: The icon id attached to the ProxyLB

name.description: The name of the ProxyLB

plan.description: The plan name of the ProxyLB. This will be one of [`100`/`500`/`1000`/`5000`/`10000`/`50000`/`100000`]

proxy_networks.description: A list of CIDR block used by the ProxyLB to access the server

region.description: The name of region that the proxy LB is in. This will be one of [`tk1`/`is1`/`anycast`]

sticky_session.description: The flag to enable sticky session

tags.description: Any tags assigned to the ProxyLB

vip.description: The virtual IP address assigned to the ProxyLB

vip_failover.description: The flag to enable VIP fail-over

id.description: The resource id on SakuraCloud used for filtering

names.description: The resource names on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

tags.description: The resource tags on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

name.description: The name of the target field. This value is case-sensitive

values.description: The values of the condition. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

cdrom_id.description: The id of the CD-ROM attached to the server

commitment.description: The policy of how to allocate virtual CPUs to the server. This will be one of [`standard`/`dedicatedcpu`]

description.description: The description of the Server

disks.description: A list of disk id connected to the server

dns_servers.description: A list of IP address of DNS server in the zone

gateway.description: The IP address of the gateway used by Server

icon_id.description: The icon id attached to the Server

interface_driver.description: The driver name of network interface. This will be one of [`virtio`/`e1000`]

ip_address.description: The IP address assigned to the Server

memory.description: The size of memory in GiB

name.description: The name of the Server

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet assigned to the Server

network_address.description: The network address which the `ip_address` belongs

private_host_id.description: The id of the private host which the server is assigned

private_host_name.description: The name of the private host which the server is assigned

tags.description: Any tags assigned to the Server

zone.description: The name of zone that the Server is in (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

id.description: The resource id on SakuraCloud used for filtering

names.description: The resource names on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

tags.description: The resource tags on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

name.description: The name of the target field. This value is case-sensitive

values.description: The values of the condition. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

host.description: The host name for connecting by VNC

password.description: The password for connecting by VNC

port.description: The port number for connecting by VNC

zone.description: The name of zone that the Server VNC Information is in (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

delay_loop.description: The interval in seconds between checks

description.description: The description of the SimpleMonitor

enabled.description: The flag to enable monitoring by the simple monitor

icon_id.description: The icon id attached to the SimpleMonitor

notify_email_enabled.description: The flag to enable notification by email

notify_email_html.description: The flag to enable HTML format instead of text format

notify_interval.description: The interval in hours between notification

notify_slack_enabled.description: The flag to enable notification by slack/discord

notify_slack_webhook.description: The webhook URL for sending notification by slack/discord

tags.description: Any tags assigned to the SimpleMonitor

target.description: The monitoring target of the simple monitor. This will be IP address or FQDN

names.description: The resource names on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

tags.description: The resource tags on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

name.description: The name of the target field. This value is case-sensitive

description.description: The description of the SSHKey

name.description: The name of the SSHKey

id.description: The resource id on SakuraCloud used for filtering

names.description: The resource names on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

name.description: The name of the target field. This value is case-sensitive

values.description: The values of the condition. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

index.description: The index of the subnet in assigned to the Switch+Router

internet_id.description: The id of the switch+router resource that the Subnet belongs

ip_addresses.description: A list of assigned global address to the Subnet

max_ip_address.description: Maximum IP address in assigned global addresses to the Subnet

min_ip_address.description: Minimum IP address in assigned global addresses to the Subnet

netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet assigned to the Subnet

network_address.description: The IPv4 network address assigned to the Subnet

next_hop.description: The ip address of the next-hop at the Subnet

switch_id.description: The id of the switch connected from the Subnet

zone.description: The name of zone that the Subnet is in (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

bridge_id.description: The bridge id attached to the Switch

description.description: The description of the Switch

icon_id.description: The icon id attached to the Switch

name.description: The name of the Switch

server_ids.description: A list of server id connected to the Switch

tags.description: Any tags assigned to the Switch

zone.description: The name of zone that the Switch is in (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

id.description: The resource id on SakuraCloud used for filtering

names.description: The resource names on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

tags.description: The resource tags on SakuraCloud used for filtering. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

name.description: The name of the target field. This value is case-sensitive

values.description: The values of the condition. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

description.description: The description of the VPCRouter

icon_id.description: The icon id attached to the VPCRouter

internet_connection.description: The flag to enable connecting to the Internet from the VPC Router

name.description: The id of the switch connected from the VPCRouter

plan.description: The plan name of the VPCRouter. This will be one of [`standard`/`premium`/`highspec`/`highspec4000`]

port_forwarding.description: A list of `port_forwarding` blocks as defined below. This represents a `Reverse NAT`

private_network_interface.description: A list of additional network interface setting. This doesn't include primary network interface setting

public_ip.description: The public ip address of the VPC Router

public_netmask.description: The bit length of the subnet to assign to the public network interface

public_network_interface.description: A list of additional network interface setting. This doesn't include primary network interface setting

static_nat.description: A list of `static_nat` blocks as defined below. This represents a `1:1 NAT`, doing static mapping to both send/receive to/from the Internet. This is only used when `plan` is not `standard`

syslog_host.description: The ip address of the syslog host to which the VPC Router sends logs

tags.description: Any tags assigned to the VPCRouter

zone.description: The name of zone that the VPCRouter is in (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

values.description: The values of the condition. If multiple values are specified, they combined as AND condition

description.description: The description of the zone

dns_servers.description: A list of IP address of DNS server in the zone

name.description: The name of the zone (e.g. `is1a`,`tk1a`)

region_id.description: The id of the region that the zone belongs
